name: Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus - Machines of War
summary: The Machines of War update for Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus allows you to use a sixth unit on the battlefield as the machine appears off the hex grid as a station weapon. Machines have two main abilities, a primary which is always active. The secondary can be either an active or passive ability.
